basics.name: Francis Underwood
basics.label: President of the USA
basics.summary: Frank Underwood has served the US Government, holding a variety of Governmental positions. He is currently serving as the 46th President of the USA after Walker's stepping down from the Government.

highlights: Took over the Presidency from Garrett Walker

volunteer.summary: Organized several charity events for the Clear Water Initiative, run by Claire Underwood, throughout the US

awards.title: Whip of the Decade
awards.summary: For Frank Underwood's unquestionable ethos in matters concerning the legislative body of the our Nation.

publications.name: The Corridors of Power
publications.summary: Power, wealth, patriotism. The road to success, finding your path to the top through a reality of weakness. Our deepest desires and secretmost thoughts all explored in a semi-biographical novel by F. Underwood

references.name: Garrett Walker
references.reference: Frank Underwood has exhibited an exemplary political ethos, serving by my side as the Whip of US Parliament and the Vice President of the USA
